amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to decrease the export and investment assistance subsidy appropriation by $25 million; to decrease bilateral economic assistance by $49.5 million; to decrease funding for USAID by $30 million; and to increase funding for the Department of State Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement by $99.5 million.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Burton amendment was withdrawn.
